content.description:
Assume that the list of numbers nums has more than 10 elements. The program below is intended to compute and display the sum of the first 10 elements of nums.

Line 1: i <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"> <mrow> <mo>←</mo> </mrow> </math> 1

Line 2: sum <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></math> 0

Line 3: REPEAT UNTIL (i > 10)

Line 4: {

Line 5:    i <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></math> i + 1

Line 6:    sum <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></math> sum + nums[i]

Line 7: }

Line 8: DISPLAY (sum)
content.question: Which change, if any, is needed for the program to work as intended?

choices.label: Line 3 should be changed to REPEAT UNTIL (i ≥ 10).
No change is needed; the program works correctly.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and correct errors in algorithms and programs, including error discovery through testing.
